author: dkhaywood
msg: mostly just moving classes around the remoting package to better reflect the main concepts (transport, protocol/marshaller, facade); started work on the http-remoting; NB: also renamed 'encoding' -> 'encoding_sockets' and 'serialize' -> 'serialize_sockets'

author: dkhaywood
msg: mostly just moving classes around the remoting package to better reflect the main concepts (transport, protocol/marshaller, facade); started work on the http-remoting; NB: also renamed 'encoding' -> 'encoding_sockets' and 'serialize' -> 'serialize_sockets'

author: dkhaywood
msg: refactored CommandClientConnectionImpl and EncodingMarshaller, have extracted out the transport-specific stuff out of the former and put into a new SocketTransport class, and inverted the relationship so that CommandClientConnectionImpl -> Marshaller -> Transport (rather than transport depending on marshaller which is what it used to be); in process, have removed the ClientMarshallerOwner interface since no longer necessary

author: dkhaywood
msg: improvements to the bytecode enhancer ... was not picking up changes correctly when run under remoting (still not quite there yet, but an improvement on previous design)

author: dkhaywood
msg: hopefully preventing splash from showing for headless viewer tests (causing its own tests to fail under CI)
